name: Jim'nJam
description:
Authors : Antoine Lugnier, Morgane Huebra and Valentin Orban

Jim'n'Jam is our submitted project for the JimJam2.

Jim and his space-dragon-ship Jam crashed on a small foreign planet. "Oh no! Jam is Jammed!" Jim has to explore the planet in order to find the materials required to repair and heal Jam. On this very tiny planet, the day night cycle is really fast, and it's really freezy coldy cold during the night, Jim would freeze instantaneously if he explored the "dark side of the planet".

-------

Keybindings :

  • E : show objectives
  • A : show inventory
  • 1 - 9 : select inventory item
  • 1, 2, 3 : use, craft, or deselect selected item
  • Z : pick up item.
  • Left and Right arrow : move
  • Up arrow : jump

-------

Realised by three French friends, students in computer science. Written in java from scratch (engine part is written based on Majoolwip Java engine tutorial series). The music was composed and recorded by Valentin (using this bad boy). All art has been made by Morgane. Antoine and Valentin coded the beast with quality certified sloppy unorganized code (as can be seen on the public GitLab repository).

-------

Downloads option available :

  • .exe file, Java Runtime Environment (JRE) 10 required
  • .zip folder containing the .exe and a compatible JRE, just in case. Just run the damn thing, no installation. Need about 200 MB of available space.
